reviews.review: A really fun action/adventure when exploring the Aperture Lab many years later. I started playing this game on Xbox 360 in 2013, a year after its release, after hearing about Portal in December of 2012. I really recommend this game to anyone.
I love the story and Perpetual Testing Initiative (Level Builder)
不愧是一代第一人称解谜经典，单人谜题难度适中，双人模式的谜题很有新意，还有玩家自制谜题也很优秀！！！
没有丢掉前作的好口碑
советую поиграть в эту игру головоломку с сюжетом

Шедевр. На века... Больше нечего сказать.
Игра отличная даже после стоко лет.
Очень интересный и захватывающий сюжет! Я рекомендую эту игру! Графика на высоте, геймплей тоже!
A good classic. Will recommend for the huge library of community maps

Muy bueno, se te pasa el tiempo volando y no te enteras.

Прикольный сюжет, хорошие персонажи, много очень много шуток, и МОРЕ ВЕСЕЛЬЯ. Это так я опишу эту игру. Я ветеран этой игры.
Yakın bir arkadaşınız varsa güzel gider kıyak oyun 8 saate bitirirsiniz tabi iq nuz 70-100 arası değilse.
Really cool puzzle game with a good story. Also if you like endless puzzle solving the online community produces an endless amount of them ranging in difficulty.

[h1]如果我说这部游戏是神作应该没有人会反对吧。[/h1]

[b]身为一款V社在2011年发布的游戏，哪怕过了十年，也仍然是让我眼前一亮的感觉！[/b]

1.[u]操作、玩法、世界观都极具脑洞[/u]，以传送枪作为一款FPS射击游戏的唯一武器，只要有可传送面，想去哪里就去哪里！同时貌似得懂一点点物理的感觉，包括对抛物线、下坠、方向的把控都挺重要。（当然也可以看运气哈哈哈）

2.角色设定，幽默的话痨人工智能Wheatley、腹黑的人工智能GLaDOS、以及我们女主角Chell是这一部游戏的主要人物，整部游戏的剧情以这三方的[u]三角关系[/u]（是不是有点不妥？）贯穿整条故事线，W哥和G姐先后做了我们主角的队友与敌人。

3.主线剧情，基本上可以说是从头到尾与人工智能为敌的感觉，不停地被“奴役”，被机器人要求做各种各样的实验。两场BOSS战也设计相当有趣，[i]我也是死了很多次才通过[/i]。

4.关卡设计上，我觉得本作在不少的关卡上是要费一些脑子的，并不是你随意放几个门就能通过的...可能在某种角度上，我觉得是我玩过的最难的游戏，我真的在很多关都卡关了，上网查了攻略才过[b]（菜）[/b]。

5.最后，[b]这是少有的可以让我感到开心和温暖的FPS游戏[/b]（毕竟也不用打打杀杀，血肉横飞）。这游戏里的机器人真的很TM可爱，我觉得W哥就是为了幽默搞笑而存在的，而且就连普通机器人发出的台词都很有趣。逃出生天的时候，看着那一片金色的麦田，竟然有一丝感动和不舍~

6.[b]月球表面也可以传送是最骚的！[/b]来到宇宙的那一刻，游戏就升华了，什么叫格局啊？（战术后仰），就像科幻电影大片一样！

7.[u]有中文好评[/u]（我印象中的老游戏很少有中文，只有V社的游戏会加中文）

评测于2020.3.20，没玩过前作一代，有错误理解请包涵啊

this game has a good plot and a plot twist and a incredable story to the game

Never play the game till recently, and I heard it's consider as one of the best games of all time Then when I beat the main single player of this game, I highly recommend this game. The puzzles are creative and their not too difficult if you know what your doing. There is some pretty good humor, writing, and an interesting story, but I think the gameplay is the best part about this game. I haven't touch the co-op while reviewing this, but I think it would be an good time. It's isn't a super long game and if you are very good at the types of games, you can beat it under 10 hours and the fact is game has been drop down to US $10 since it release this in 2011 makes this even more worth the price.
Puzzles bem divertidos, sem falar da história por trás q também é bem inteligente, adorei.
Best game of all time everrrr
AMAZING GRAPHICS AND SUPER GREAT GAMEPLAY AND PLOT!!!!! *sry for the caps :P*
Jogo muito bom divertido com otima narrativa e trilha sonora so faltou uma dublagem ou pelomenos uma legenda em portugues.

Directly before receiving the portal gun Wheatley told me he would come find me to bury my body if I did not show up after a hour. Being the stubborn person I am, I waited for over an hour in the same spot, AND HE NEVER ARRIVED. Terrible game design.

This game was quite literally one pf the only things I had for awhile. I love this game. With such an interesting mechanic in the portals. it makes this one of the best games out there. I have played through the story more than 7 times and I still enjoy the humor of the game. I will always love this game, and if you haven't played it (the 10% of you out there), give it a shot. Maybe you will love it just as much as I have.
This is a game game is meant for thoughith entertainment so no it isn't not fun.
One of my favourite games ever!
One co-op to rule them all

You´ve probably played this game before, but if you didn´t keep these things in mind.
This game is a masterpiece. A great mix of humor and exciting gameplay. One of the rare games you can finish once, come back in a couple of months and play again and still do stuff differently. Definitely in my top 3 game. Watch out for the easter eggs that are significant. 
And remember THE CAKE IS A LIE.
It's Valve, It's Portal what else needs to be said. Buy it

I love everything about this game, both 1 & 2. Glados' sarcasm, the "testing" itself, the portal mechanics and game physics - all top notch. I love the player-made courses, too, in the Workshop. Lots of creativity & talent on display! I hope they make more at some point, though that's probably just a pipe dream. Loved the gels, there are a billion ways they could make this more complex and not go overboard.

Это одна из лучших игр, в которые я играл. Это легендарная игра. Если ваш друг говорит что портал, либо портал 2 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, то pizdanite emu po ebalu, и перестаньте с ним дружить. Онлайн в этой игре не так важен, но если есть друг, то проходите совместную кампанию (часов 7 игры, если вы тупой). В заключении повоторюсь, одна из лучших игр, в которые я играл top!!!
Much better then portal one and Whitley is very enjoyable.

Приятная, интересная и просто хорошая игра, прям мастплей

А Уитли пидapac

molto molto originale e coinvolgente...glados poi è fantastica...con tutte le sue sfaccettature....per non parlare degli enigmi....sempre originali e gradualmente piu complicati e sempre nuovi....quando pensi che portal 2 abbia giocato tutte le sue carte...è pronto a ristupirti.ò...must have

Świetny co-op.  
Grafika przyjemna dla oka. 
Dźwięki oraz efekty specjalne na wysokim poziomie. 
Trzeba pogłówkować ale co dwie głowy to nie jedna. 
Bardzo ciekawe poziomy każdy poziom unikatowy i daje wiele frajdy przechodzenie oraz momentami mamy fabułę która może nie zaskakuje ale wkręca :)

This is a great puzzle game for both single player and multiplayer formats. The single player has a great story and the progression of the challenge in the levels is fair and engaging. The physics and mechanics are where this game shines and it gives you different ways to work out solutions. Multiplayer is even more fun in my opinion. It's a lot of fun to work together and even mess with your friends while playing, resulting in some really entertaining moments.
I love portal and I finally have it! I give portal 100000000/10.
